definition: cheerful and bright, any of numerous plants of the genus Gladiolus native chiefly to tropical and South Africa having sword-shaped leaves and one-sided spikes of brightly colored funnel-shaped flowers
details:
adjective
- cheerful and bright
= synonyms: beaming
- feeling happy appreciation
= example: feeling happy appreciation
- showing or causing joy and pleasure
- eagerly disposed to act or to be of service
= example: eagerly disposed to act or to be of service
= synonyms: happy
noun
- any of numerous plants of the genus Gladiolus native chiefly to tropical and South Africa having sword-shaped leaves and one-sided spikes of brightly colored funnel-shaped flowers
= synonyms: gladiolus, sword lily, gladiola
